abstract: To avoid being subject to a New York State law that would have forced it to collect sales taxes on sales to New York residents, Overstock.com has cut off its dealings with Web sites in the state that send it customers.
snippet: To avoid being subject to a New York State law that would have forced it to collect sales taxes on sales to New York residents, Overstock.com has cut off its dealings with Web sites in the state that send it customers.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE | 5/14 5:47 PM Amazon says it will not cut off its affiliates and will start collecting New York sales tax by June 1. See end.

headline.main: Overstock.com Throws New York Affiliates Overboard to Avoid Sales Tax
